summary: Dhading  District Hospital has been dealing with people with a different kind of emergency of late. The hospital authority claims that the number of people visiting the hospital to answer the nature’s call equals those who come for medical help on a daily basis. On Saturdays, the hospital receives more people who are there just to use the toilet, said one hospital staff. With no public toilet facility at the district headquarters, people who come from various parts of the district for
title: potty-patients-swarm-hospital
